. Gartner says Gmail has captured less than 1% of the enterprise e-mail market, counting only businesses with at least 100 paid seats. Managed services partners are jumping on board, though. A growing number of MSPs have embraced the Google Apps Reseller program, says an MSPmentor says Eric Schmidt 's Google has gained "more channel partner momentum with managed services providers. Indeed, 29 of the world's top 100 MSPs now promote Google Apps to their end-customers."

the top of the company." Larry Page, who founded the company with Sergey Brin will now run the company in the CEO role with Eric Schmidt moving to an "Executive Chairman" role. Larry will now lead product development and technology strategy, his greatest strengths, and starting from April 4 he will take charge of our day-to-day operations as Google's Chief Executive Officer. In this new role I know he will merge Google's technology and business vision brilliantly, says Eric Schmidt before adding: "I am enormously proud of my last decade as CEO, and I am certain that the next 10 years under Larry will be even better!
